sections.title: Background to the Psychology of Christian Alchemical Symbolism
sections.thesis: Method and framework for reading symbolic traditions psychologically without collapsing them into literalism.

sections.body: This chapter matters because it clarifies the lens you will use throughout Aion: symbolic tensions are not distractions, but the material of psychological transformation.

terms.definition: A disciplined way of reading images psychologically without reducing them to literal history or private fantasy.
The displacement of unconscious contents onto people, groups, or events, distorting perception.
A symbolic tradition whose images can be read as dramatizations of psychological transformation processes.
